• Pre-eclampsia may also occur for the first time during the intrapartum or in the early post-partum period.
White Coat Hypertension 
• This refers to hypertension that is present from early pregnancy when measured at a clinical examination, but
is normal at home. It conveys an increased risk for pre-eclampsia.
